Master draw cool provides us with
specific techniques and practices that

there can be a technique of dying and a
training given during life which will
lead up to the utilization of that

focused in the head through
visualization and meditation and through
the steady practice of concentration
developed the capacity to live

emotional insistence on activity
directed toward handling the affairs of

process of abstraction for watch and
record all phenomena connected with the
withdrawing process whether followed in
the meditation work or in going to sleep
